summary.para: The DownloadCompleted method is called back on an arbitrary thread when a download operation ends.

param.name: downloadQueue
param.para: Pointer to the download queue interface on which the BeginDownload method was called.

param.name: context
param.para: Optional context object that was passed to BeginDownload. AddRef is called on the context object by BeginDownload and Release is called after the DownloadCompleted method returns.

summary.para: Application-defined callback interface that receives notifications from the font download queue (
interface). Callbacks will occur on the downloading thread, and objects must be prepared to handle calls on their methods from other threads at any time.
